title: About Paragraph Plugin
synopsis: Most items in a story are paragraphs. Double click a Factory to make a paragraph. Press return (enter) when editing a paragraph to make a new paragraph.

title: Anthropological Archive
synopsis: An [[archive]] can be considered as a store of artefacts, whether digital or physical, but here we look to describe something more organic, more "present" and evolving in terms of structure, and more psychosocial in terms of content.

title: Mobile First Teaching

title: Viable system model
synopsis: The viable system model (VSM) is a model of the organisational structure of any autonomous system capable of producing itself. A viable system is any system organised in such a way as to meet the demands of surviving in the changing environment. One of the prime features of systems that survive is that they are adaptable. The VSM expresses a model for a viable system, which is an abstracted cybernetic (regulation theory) description that is applicable to any organisation that is a viable system and capable of autonomy - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Via
